text: You should return a HTTP.Response with xmlstring as the body and set the headers on the response

elements.text: You should return a HTTP.Response with xmlstring as the body and set the headers on the response

text: Great! Thanks! That worked. Although I have to confess that took me 10min to realize that headers was a positional argument and not a keyword argument
